overview: After surviving a stabbing by a student, teacher Trevor Garfield moves from New York to Los Angeles. There, he resumes teaching as a substitute teacher. The education system, where violent bullies control the classrooms and the administration is afraid of lawsuits, slowly drives Garfield mad.
tagline: When schools become war zones and both sides start taking casualties, what then?
cast: Samuel L. Jackson|John Heard|Kelly Rowan|Clifton Collins Jr.|Tony Plana
